text: # Gemini API ___ Google AI for Developers Get a Gemini API key and make your first API request in minutes. from google import genai client = genai.Client(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY") response = client.models.generate_content( model="gemini-2.0-flash", contents="Explain how AI works", ) print(response.text) from google import genai client = genai.Client(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY") response = client.models.generate_content( model="gemini-2.0-flash", contents="Explain how AI works", ) print(response.text) const { GoogleGenerativeAI } = require("@google/generative-ai"); const genAI = new GoogleGenerativeAI("YOUR_API_KEY"); const model = genAI.getGenerativeModel({ model: "gemini-2.0-flash" }); const prompt = "Explain how AI works"; const result = await model.generateContent(prompt); console.log(result.response.text()); const { GoogleGenerativeAI } = require("@google/generative-ai"); const genAI = new GoogleGenerativeAI("YOUR_API_KEY"); const model = genAI.getGenerativeModel({ model: "gemini-2.0-flash" }); const prompt = "Explain how AI works"; const result = await model.generateContent(prompt); console.log(result.response.text()); curl "https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash:generateContent?key=YOUR_API_KEY" \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \ -X POST \ -d '{ "contents": [{ "parts":[{"text": "Explain how AI works"}] }] }' curl "https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/gemini-2.0-flash:generateContent?key=YOUR_API_KEY" \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \ -X POST \ -d '{ "contents": [{ "parts":[{"text": "Explain how AI works"}] }] }' Our newest multimodal model, with next generation features and improved capabilities Our fastest and most cost-efficient multimodal model with great performance for high-frequency tasks Our best performing multimodal model with features for a wide variety of reasoning tasks Input millions of tokens to Gemini models and derive understanding from unstructured images, videos, and documents. Modify the behavior of Gemini models to adapt to specific tasks, recognize data, and solve problems. Tune models with your own data to make production deployments more robust and reliable. Constrain Gemini to respond with JSON, a structured data format suitable for automated processing.
